title: Geoffrey Hinton, Godfather of AI, Has a Hopeful Plan for Keeping Future AI Friendly
description: Geoffrey Hinton left Google so he could speak more freely about AI’s dangers. He argues that building analog computers instead of digital ones might keep the technology more loyal.

title: Smell Your Way Out of the Uncanny Valley
description: In simulated environments, smell is often the neglected sense. Scentient’s wearable device aims to bring a whiff of authenticity to virtual reality.

title: Cruise and Waymo Robotaxis Can Now Work the Streets of San Francisco 24/7
description: Robotaxis can offer paid rides in San Francisco around the clock after Alphabet’s Waymo and GM’s Cruise got approval from California’s Public Utilities Commission.
